name: Born To Root
description:
Incarnate a root who's mission is to survive the waves of humans trying to take down your mother tree, collect resources, grow armoured fighters and defence yourself while navigating in the underearth.

The designs were created on Aseprite, a pixelart tool. Ableton Live for sound design and Godot Engine with github to program.

Made in 48 hours as part of the 2023 Global  Game Jam Geneva.
